thread.title: Lady Gaga Throws Her Mic, Catches a Football, & Jumps Off the Stage During Halftime Performance! (VIDEO)
thread.title_full: Lady Gaga Throws Her Mic, Catches a Football, & Jumps Off the Stage During Halftime Performance! (VIDEO)

author: Just Jared
title: Lady Gaga Throws Her Mic, Catches a Football, & Jumps Off the Stage During Halftime Performance! (VIDEO)
text:
Lady Gaga Throws Her Mic, Catches a Football, & Jumps Off the Stage During Halftime Performance! (VIDEO) 
Lady Gaga ended her Super Bowl Halftime Show in the most iconic way ever! 
Between jumping into her performance from the roof of the stadium, showing off her killer abs, and slaying her choreography, Gaga totally owned her performance. 
Gaga ended her show by performing her 2009 hit song “Bad Romance” before tossing her mic off stage, catching a glitter football in the air, and jumping off stage! 
Watch the clip below! 
— Hollywood Reporter (@THR) February 6, 2017 Just Jared on Facebook Photos: Getty
